metadata.title: CVE-2021-4182 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Crash in the RFC 7468 dissector in Wireshark 3.6.0 and 3.4.0 to 3.4.10 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
